name: Ada & The Jabberwock
description:
Ada & The Jabberwock

By Daniel Povey

The kingdom of Elgna has been invaded by the Jabberwock, and it is up to Ada to defeat him & reclaim the stolen All-Seeing Crystal!

Ada & The Jabberwock was made in RPG Maker MV for RPG Biz's RPG Maker Game Jam, which is why everything uses the stock RMMV resources. It's a parody of RPGs with multiple endings (five in total). I also downplayed the combat; There's no level-ups or item drops (meaning you don't have to grind). There's also no randomly appearing enemies; everyone's visible on the playing field (think Earthbound/Mother or Paper Mario).

Space or Z: confirm
Escape or X: cancel & menu

The game's short enough that you can finish it in a single sitting, but I've left the save feature in there in case you need it.

For those of you who haven't played many JRPGs: Talk to everyone, and don't forget to equip your apparel after you've bought it.

Have fun.

To satisfy RMMV's EULA:
